attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the barbaric practice of slaughtering livestock for human consumption by cutting their throats without frstly stunning them. This is a cruel practice which causes unnecessary suffering to the animals Thus despatched.This is a civilised society in which there should be no place for such barbarism.

rejection.details: The main sentence - 'title' must be a call to action for HM Government, not a name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
